title: In Used Books
description:
Emma Smreker searches through used bookstores and thrift shops on the weekends. But she isn’t looking for an amazing deal… she’s searching for things hidden within the pages of secondhand books.

Follow In Used Books on Instagram (@inusedbooks)

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes

--
